meta.title: Kristina Grlić
meta.description: This is a description for Kristina Grlić.

meta.title: Top 5 Online Sticker Stores
meta.description: If you were wondering where to find the perfect stickers, here is our top five online sticker stores.

content.value: ## Online Sticker Stores

After the early 2000's there has been a rise in the number of online stores where you could order a huge number of custom made stickers. With the popularity of stickers, in general, was an expected reaction. However, as with all other things, there are leading websites that stand out, either with the quality of their products or their variety of services and products. Many of these online stores sell previously designed stickers, but some of them provide services of creating custom stickers. Meaning that they can create a sticker exactly how you wanted or imagined it.

Since stickers are a fun and creative way of expressing yourself, the aim of this blog post is to help you find the right ones for yourselves. We will list some websites other than Amazon, AliExpress and eBay, since everyone knows about those three online stores.
### Redbubble

Redbubble is one of the leading online stores that sells not only stickers but other interesting products as well. What makes Redbubble stand out so much is the fact that anyone can post their designs and sell them on this platform. Anyone can register and upload their designs and sell them in the form of stickers, phone cases, notebook covers and so on. They handle everything that has to do with production and shipping, the artists only post their illustrations. And that's what's so amazing about it. There are over thousands of artist daily posting their works and letting you choose the one you like best. What's even more interesting, if you can't find exactly what you're looking for, you can always upload one of your own designs and order your own sticker! All in all, Redbubble is a great place to find unique and creative stickers.
### Etsy

Esty is also an amazing online store where you can find various products designed by individuals. However, people mostly search for stickers over at Etsy. If you go over to the website, and, for example, search for cool stickers, you'll see a number of different filters on the left side of the store. You can tick boxes that relate to the kind of sticker you're looking for. That is a very helpful feature, because you don't have to go through thousands of stickers to find the specific one you are looking for. Etsy is an amazing online store for stickers that will certainly make you stand out.
### Cafe Press

Cafe Press is an online shop that sells a large number of different merchandise. In this way, it is quite similar to the first two online stores. Besides providing various previously designed products, they let you upload your own designs and create custom products. However, they do not offer custom die cut stickers, only square, rectangular, oval and bumper stickers. They also have a filtering system so you can easily find a perfects sticker for yourself or your friends.
### Society6

Society6 is visually and technically similar to Redbubble. If you are searching for stickers as a customer, you can easily find some of the coolest stickers that will suit all your needs. However, if you are an aspiring designer, this is also a great place to sell your designs. As they mention, you can find over 30 products with thousands of different designs. The store is available to anyone, but there are so many different artists register that you can definitely find an unique piece of art and turn it into a sticker, table or a blanket.
### Sticker Mule

Sticker Mule is well known for their incredible customer support and sticker quality. They primarily work on custom stickers and you can have them delivered on rolls or on sheets. They do oval, rectangle, square and even die cut forms. However, the most interesting fact about this online store is that they offer free shipping, but only if you order products that take only up to 4 days to produce and 2 days to ship. This website is great for anyone who makes their own products since they even offer a discount for buying more stickers, which is great if you need labels for your products.
We hope that this article was somewhat helpful in your search for cool and unique stickers. Don't forget to check out originally designed stickers at this link. Have fun and stay creative!

meta.title: Kristina Grlić
meta.description: Ovo je opis za Kristinu Grlić.

meta.title: Top 5 Online Prodavnica Stikera
meta.description: Ako ste se ikada pitali gde da pronađete savršene stikere, ovo je naš predlog za top 5 online prodavnica.

content.value: ## Online Stiker Prodavnice

Od 2000. godine broj online prodavnica u kojima se mogu pronaći i kupiti originalno dizajnirani stikeri je drastično skočio. Međutim, kao i sa svime ostalim, i u ovom segmentu postoje oni sajtovi koji se smatraju za jednim od boljih online prodavnica i koji ističu po nečemu od ostalih, bilo to po kvalitetu svojih proizvoda ili po raznolikosti usluga koje pružaju. Mnoge od online prodavnica koje možete pronaći na internetu prodaju unapred dizajnirane nalepnice, ali neki ih i izrađuju po potrebi kupaca. Ukratko, ovo znači da mogu izraditi stiker baš onakav kakav ste hteli ili zamislili.

Stikeri predstavljaju lak i zabavan način da izrazite sebe i da pokažete svoju kreativnu i umetničku stranu. Budući da je cilj ovog članka da vam olakašamo potragu za savršenim stikerima, predtavićemo vam nekoliko alternativa za najveće online prodavnice kao što su Amazon, AliExpress i eBay. Ovi sajtovi koji će biti izlistani su naši predlozi koji će vam pružiti druge šarenolike opcije koje mogu biti kvalitetnije, a možda i jeftinije. Ono što je takođe bitno spomenuti jeste da sve ove online prodavnice šalju svoju robu iz inostranstva, tj. nemaju sedišta u Srbiji.
### Redbubble

Redbubble je jedna od vodećih online prodavnica, koja ne prodaje samo stikere nego i mnogo drugih interesantnih proizvoda. A to po čemu se Redbubble toliko ističe je to što dozvoljava bilo kome da postavi svoje dizajne i prodaje ih u obliku raznih proizvoda preko ove platforme. Ko god voli da kreira može da napravi nalog, postavi svoj dizajn i prodaje ga u obliku stikera, meski za telefon, jastučnica i slično. Redbubble tim odradi sve što je vezano za proizvodnju i isporuku proizvoda, a umetnici samo postavljaju svoje ilustracije. Zato je i toliko popularan. Preko hiljadu umetnika dnevno postavlja svoje ilustracije od kojih možete izabrati one koje vam se najviše dopadaju. Što je još interesantnije, ako kojim slučajem i ne pronađete ništa što vam se dopada, uvek možete postaviti neki svoj dizajn i onda poručiti. Tako se ne morate mučiti oko proizvodnje ili odlaženja do štamparije. Sve u svemu, Redbubble je super online prodavnica gde možete pronaći unikatne i kreativne stikere.
### Etsy

Etsy je takođe jedna sjajna online prodavnica u kojoj možete pronaći neverovatne ručno pravljene stvarčice koje kreiraju pojedinci. Međutim, stikeri su jedna od najtraženijih stvari u ovoj online prodavnici. Ako odete na Etsy, i u polje za pretragu ukucate "cool stickers", na primer, videćete sa leve strane dosta  različitih filtera koje možete iskoristiti. Samo treba da štiklirate polje koje se odnosi na stiker koji želite da pronađete. Ovi felteri su super dodatak online prodavnicama jer ne morate da prolazite kroz hiljade stikera da bi našli ono što vas zanima i što vam je potrebno. Etsy je definitivno mesto na kojem možete pronaći stikere po kojima ćete se isticati.
### Cafe Press

Cafe Press je online prodavnica koja se bavi proizvodnjom i prodajom mnogobrojnih artikala. Po tome je veoma slična već pomenutim prodavnicama. Pored ponude proizvoda sa unapred odrađenim dizajnom, takođe nude uslugu izrade proizvoda sa vašim dizajnom. Međutim, jedna mana im je što ne nude opciju konturnog sečenja, nego izrađuju samo okrugle, ovalne i pravougaone nalepnice. Ali, i oni imaju sistem za filtriranje pretraga tako da lako i brzo dolazite do nalepnice koje želite za sebe ili svoje prijatelje.
### Society6

Society6 i Redbubble su vizuelno i tehnički dosta slični jedno drugom. Ako pretražujete Society6 kao mušterija, onda ćete na ovoj online prodavnici pronaći jedne od najunikatinij i najinteresantnijih nalepnica koje će ispuniti svaku vašu potrebu. S druge strane, ako ste dizajner u usponu ovo je takođe odlično mesto za prodaju vaših dizajna. Kako oni kažu, možete pronaći preko 30 proizvoda i birati između hiljade i hiljade dizajna za određeni proizvod. Ova online prodavnica je otovrena za sve, ali ima toliko različitih registrovanih umetnika da ćete sto posto pronaći neki dizajn da vam se svidi i pretvoriti ga u stiker, poster ili ćebe.
### Sticker Mule

Sticker Mule je online prodavnica koja je dobro poznata po svom odličnom korisničkom servisu i kvalitetu stikera. Njihov fokus je na izradi originalnih nalepnica koje možete poručiti na tabaku ili u rolni. A što se oblika nalepnica tiče, rade u svim mogućim oblicima, a nude i usluge konturnog sečenja. Takođe je ineteresantna informacija da je isporuka nalepnica besplatna, ako poručite količinu nalepnica za koju je dovoljno 4 dana da se proizvedu i 2 dana da vam se isporuče. Sticker Mule je prava online prodavnica za one koji proizvode sami svoje proizvode jer imaju i popuste na količine, što je super ako su vam potrebne nalepnice za ono što proizvodite i prodajete.

Nadamo se da vam je ovaj članak donekle pomogao u vašoj potrazi za unikatnim i interesantnim nalepnicama. Nemojte zaboraviti da pogledate naše stikere klikom na ovaj link. Uživajte i ostanite kreativni!

meta.title: Kristina Grlić
meta.description: This is a description for Kristina Grlić.

meta.title: The History of Stickers
meta.description: Let's look at when, how and why were stickers first created.

content.value: ## The First Stickers

As we strive to carve out our identity and sense of self, we search for means and ways of expressing our individuality, be it through art, music, writing, or something else. Throughout recent years a seemingly new and interesting way of expressing individuality emerged — stickers. However, one might be surprised to find out that stickers have been around for much longer, though not in the form we recognize today.

Depending on what people consider to be a sticker, you can find three general answers to the question when did stickers first emerge.
Some say that stickers began their story in the times of Ancient Egypt, where people glued papers with names and prices of their products on the walls of their markets. It was an easy and fast way to give the customers the most wanted information. However, this raises the question if these can be considered as the first stickers; after all, they were more like posters than stickers.

Another theory suggests that the first stickers made their appearance in the form of postage stamps, created by Sir Rowland Hill in the mid 1800's. However, stamps are also a little bit different than our modern stickers. They are not self-adhesive by themselves. You had to wet them so that you could glue them to the envelope.

And finally, you could say that our modern-day sticker was firstly created by Ray Stanton Avery in 1935, when he invented the first self-adhesive label. He was the founder of "Avery Adhesives". But soon he merged with another company called Dennison Manufacturing, to create Avery Dennison, a company that still exists. They produce labels for all sorts of various merchandise objects, among all other things. It could be said that this was the real emergence of stickers.
### How were the first stickers created?

The aforementioned theory of the emergence of the modern-day sticker seems to be the most plausible one, and the one we have the most proof for. Therefore, let’s look into how "Avery Dennison" made their first stickers.
It is very interesting how these modern-day machines managed to evolve from a thing that was created by  R. S. Avery back in the 1900's. His first self-adhesive or pressure sensitive die-cut machine was created by combining used machine parts with a saber saw. Of course, he patented the invention and today it is known as the world's first self-adhesive (also called pressure sensitive) die-cut labeling machine. The first stickers that he created were simple circle labels, which were quite nifty because they were easily peeled off without leaving a mark on the product.
### Why were Stickers Even Created?

As mentioned above, first stickers were used to give certain information about a specific product. Avery's first round stickers were created so that the producers could label prices of their products, and since they didn't leave any marks, they were perfect for this. Soon Avery realized that these labels can present more information than just prices. They started creating product labels for different producers. Since they were a great way to present information about a certain product, people started using them more and more for advertising their merchandise.

Besides this, stickers were also used for political purposes, like advertising campaigns. In the 1900's, you could see cars and mailboxes covered with "I Voted" stickers. And they're popular even today. America is the most well-known country that practices this type of political expression.

Then people realized that stickers were a great way of expressing their thoughts and attitudes and started producing some of them for those purposes only. Just think about it, with a single sticker you can state anything. And that's how we ended up with all these different kinds of fun and creative stickers. What is even more interesting, they are still used for all the things mentioned above, and with the rise of planners and bullet journals people seem to find different ways for using them every day.
## Stickers Today

Nowadays, you can find various kinds of stickers. They come in many different shapes, sizes and designs. They can be printed on different types of paper. Their method of gluing can be different; they can be self-adhesive, their glue can be triggered by water or heat and so on. The production of stickers is also different depending on where you want to stick them. There are companies that manufacture wall stickers, car stickers or notebook stickers.

In my opinion, the leading role of stickers is still labeling products. However, even long before bullet journals got so popular, kids used to play with stickers all the time, covering their notebooks or toys. They're just really fun to play around with. But as mentioned above, with the invention of bullet journals, the production of stickers skyrocketed. People realized that stickers were an easy way of decorating their notes and keeping them more organized. Still, people seem to find different uses for stickers everyday. That's what's so fun about them. You can use them however you want, to decorate, to express yourself, to cover your mistakes, literally anything that comes to your mind.

Today you can find many online stores where you can find different kinds of stickers. There are even some platforms where many artists can create their own profiles and sell their designs in the form of stickers, like Redbubble or Society6. 
 If you’re still not quite sure that you can express yourself with only one sticker, try finding one in my store or on these two platforms. I guarantee you that you’ll find something that suits you just right.
Make sure to check out originally designed stickers at this link and don’t forget to have fun and stay creative!

meta.title: Kristina Grlić
meta.description: Ovo je opis za Kristinu Grlić.

meta.title: Istorija nalepnica
meta.description: Pogledajmo kada, kako i zašto su prve nalepnice stvorene.

content.value: ## Prve nalepnice

U procesu stvaranja sopstvenog identiteta tražimo načine kako da izrazimo individualnost, bilo to kroz umetnost, muziku, pisanje ili nešto sasvim drugo. Naizgled nov i interesantan način izražavanja sopstvenog identiteta je isplivao tokom poslednjih par godina  — nalepnice. Međutim, možda biste bili iznenađeni činjenicom da su nalepnice prisutne već dugi niz godina, doduše možda ne u obliku u kom ih mi prepoznajemo.
U zavisnosti od toga šta ubrajate pod nalepnicama, postoje tri generalna odgovora na pitanje kada su se pojavile po prvi put.

Po nekim navodima prve nalepnice su nastale u drevnom Egiptu, kada su ljudi lepili papire sa nazivima proizvoda i cenama po njihovim tezgama. To je bio jednostavan i brz način da mušterijama pruže najtraženije informacije. Međutim, ovo vodi do pitanja da li ih zaista možemo posmatrati kao prve nalepnice jer ipak deluju više kao posteri nego nalepnice.

Druga teorija je da su se prve nalepnice pojavile u obliku poštanskih markica, stvorene od strane Ser Rolanda Hila sredinom 19-og veka. Međutim, poštanske markice su malo drugačije od savremenih nalepnica. Nisu samolepljive, već ih neko mora nakvasiti da bi se zalepile za kovertu.

I konačno, moglo bi se reći da je Rej Stenton Ejveri prvobitno stvorio savremene nalepnice 1935. godine kada je izmislio prvu samolepljivu etiketu. On je bio osnivač kompanije „Avery Adhesives.” Ubrzo je spojio kompaniju sa kompanijom „Dennison Manufacturing” da bi stvorili „Avery Dennison”, kompaniju koja i dan-danas postoji. Između ostalog, proizvode i raznovrsne etikete za mnogobrojnu vrstu robe. Moglo bi se reći da je ovo prvo pojavljivanje nalepnica u pravom smislu.
### Kako su prve nalepnice stvorene?
Gorepomenuta teorija o prvim savremenim nalepnicama deluje kao najtačnije i ona za koju imamo najviše dokaza. S obzirom na to, pogledajmo kako su „Avery Dennison” napravili prvu nalepnicu.

Interesantno je videti kako su se savremene mašine razvile od onoga što je R. S. Ejveri stvorio u 19-om veku. Njegova prva mašina je stvorena kombinacijom polovnih mašinskih delova i jednostavne testere. Naravno, patentirao je ovaj izum i danas je poznat kao prva mašina za sečenje samolepljivih etiketa na svetu. Prve nalepnice koje je stvorio su bile etikete jednostavnog dizajna u obliku kruga, koje su bile poprilično pogodne za obeležavanje robe jer su se lako odlepljivale bez ostavljanja ikakvog traga.
### Zašto su nalepnice uopšte stvorene?

Kao je što je gore navedeno, prve nalepnice su služile da pružaju određenu informaciju o specifičnom proizvodu. Ejverijeve prve etikete su stvorene da bi proizvođači mogli da obleže cenu proizvoda i pošto nisu ostavljali nikakav trag bile su odlične u tu svrhu. Ubrzo je Ejveri shvatio da se ove etikete mogu koristiti za iskazivanje drugih informacija osim cena, kao što su sam naziv proizvoda, naziv proizvođača, sastojaka i slično. Pošto su predstavljali odličan način da se prezentuje informacija o određenom proizvodu, ljudi su počeli sve više i više da ih koriste za reklamiranje proizvoda.

Osim za reklamiranje, nalepnice su se koristile u političke svrhe kao što je recimo reklamiranje kampanje za izbore. U 20-om veku su se mogli videti automobili i poštanska sandučad oblepljena nalepnicama na kojima piše „Glasao sam.” Čak su i danas popularni. Amerika je poznata kao zemlja koja i dan-danas ovo radi.
## Nalepnice danas

U današnje vreme je moguće pronaći raznovrsne nalepnice. Mogu se pronaći u raznim oblicima, veličinama i dizajnima. Mogu biti štampane na različitim vrstama papira. Njihov način lepljenja može biti raznolik; mogu biti samolepljive, lepak na njima se može aktivirati vodom ili toplotom i tako dalje. Proizvodnja nalepnica je takođe različita u zavisnosti od toga gde želite da ih zalepite. Postoje firme koje proizvode nalepnice za zid, za auto ili za sveske.

Po mom mišljenu, Vodeća uloga nalepnica je i dalje obeležavanje proizvoda. Međutim, čak i pre perioda kada su dnevnici postali tako popularni, deca su se oduvek igrala sa nalepnicama. Ali, kao što je malopre spomenuto, dnevnici su podstakli popularnost nalepnica i njihova proizvodnja je masovno skočila. Ljudi su shvatili da su nalepnice lak način za ukrašavanje beležaka i da pomažu u efikasnijem organizovanju. Ljudi svakodnevno pronalaze različite upotrebe za nalepnice. To je ono što ih čini zabavnim. Možete ih koristiti kako god želite, da ukrašavate, da izrazite sebe, da prikrijete greške, kako god da vam padne na pamet.

Danas možete pronaći veliki broj online prodavnica gde možete otkriti raznovrsne nalepnice. Postoje i neke platforme, kao što su Redbubble ili Society6, gde umetnici mogu da naprave profil i prodaju svoje dizajne nalepnica.  
Ako i dalje niste sigurni kako da izrazite sebe sa samo jednom nalepnicom, pokušajte tako što ćete svratiti u moju prodavnicu ili na neku od onih platformi. Garantujem da ćete pronaći nešto što vama odgovara u potpunosti.
Svratite na ovu stranicu sa originalno dizajniranim nalepnicama i ne zaboravite da se zabavite i da ostanete kreativni!

content.value: ## Online shop and creative blog

My name is Hugzie and I like drawing, designing and creating stuff. And this website is my way of doing what I love the most and that is inspiring others.
Here, you can find my shop, with a lot of cool merch and a blog where you can read articles on various topics, like drawing, designing, DIYs, art in general and anything that has to do with creation that can inspire others.The main idea is to bring together people who have that urge to create and inspire each other.
## Hugzie - prodavnica i kreativni blog
### Najbolje mesto za kreativce i ljubitelje umetnosti

Zdrav, ja sam Hugzie i volim da crtam, dizajniram i pravim kreativne stvarčice. Ova stranica mi dozvoljava da radim ono što najviše volim, a to je inspirisanje drugih. 
Ovde možete naći moju online prodavnicu koja sadrži razne kul proizvode, ali i blog gde možete pročitati tekstove o raznim temama, kao što su crtanje, dizajniranje, "uradi sam" projekti, umetnost generalno, itd. Glavni cilj ovog sajta je da poveže ljude koji osećaju potrebu za stvaranjem i inspirisanjem.
## Stickers
Find cool custom made stickers for you and your friends
## Stikeri
Pronađi kul stikere za sebe i svoje prijatelje
## Blogs
Read texts on various topics, get inspired and learn something new!
## Blogovi
Pročitaj tekstove o raznim temama, inspiriši se i nauči nešto novo!
## About Us
### Our Mission

Hugzie's number one mission is to create unique and original, but affordable stickers for everyone. Since 2018, we are aiming at creating a variety of stickers where anyone can find something for themselves. Our group is small but we love what we do and that makes us quite efficient.

The idea behind this website was not only to sell our products but also to create a community where creative people can find all sorts of entertainment and information. You can find articles about interesting topics on our blog. We cover various topics, from design and creating over movies and music to software tutorials. We would like to inspire you and set you in a creative mood.
### Products

At our store, you can find many different self-adhesive stickers and every single one of them were carefully designed with love and passion. Stickers are sold in two sizes (50x50mm and 70x70mm) and are printed on three types of paper (PVC with a white background, transparent PVC, and textured paper).

Beside original stickers, you can also find interesting self-adhesive patterns in our store. They are sold in one size, 140x200mm and are printed also printed on three types of paper (PVC with a white background, transparent PVC, and textured paper).
### Shipping

For now, we do not ship our products internationally. We send them only throughout the Republic of Serbia, where our headquarters are. However, we are working on expanding our shipping and sending our merchandise all over the world.
## O nama
### Naša misija

Misija broj jedan Hugzie portala je da pruži jedinstvene i orignalne, ali i pristupačne nalepnice za sve. Od 2018. godine, naš cilj je da kreiramo raznovrsne nalepnice kako bi svako pronašao ponešto za sebe. Naš krug ljudi je uzak, ali ljubav prema onome što radimo nas čini veoma efikasnim.

Ideja za ovaj portal nije bila samo prodaja naših proizvoda, već i stvaranje jedne kreativne zajednice i pružanje zabavnog i informativnog sadržaja. Iz tog razloga možete pronaći mnogo interesantih tekstova na našem blogu. Pišemo tekstove o raznoraznim temama, od dizajniranja i stvaranja, preko filmova i muzike do tutorijala o različitim softverima za dizajniranje.
### Proizvodi

U našoj prodavnici možete promaći raznolike samolepljive stikere i svaki od njih je dizajniran s ljubavlju i strašću. Prodajemo ih u dve različite veličine (50x50mm and 70x70mm) i štampamo ih na tri različite vrste samolepljivih papira (PVC sa belom pozadinom, PVC sa providnom pozadinom i papir sa teksturom).

Pored originalno dizajniranih nalepnica, u našoj prodavnici možete naći i zanimljive samolepljive šablone. Njih prodajemo u jednoj veličini, 140x200mm, ali ih takođe štampamo na tri različite vrste samolepljivih papira (PVC sa belom pozadinom, PVC sa providnom pozadinom i papir sa teksturom).
### Dostava

Za sada naše proizvode dostavljamo samo na teritoriji Republike Srbije, gde se i nalazi naše sedište. Radimo na tome i nadamo se da ćemo u budućnosti biti u mogućnosti da šaljemo naše proizvode po celom svetu.
